Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{3: 'You receive an email invitation from Bambinata, but instead of a straightforward address, she only provides a set of coordinates.'}
{3: 'You follow the coordinates and end up in a secluded clearing.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1017.jpg'}
{3: 'Before you actually see Bambinata, you hear the lively strains of Kowloong-style music floating in the breeze.'}
{3: 'In the middle of the grass, you spot a petite figure dancing in sync with the melody.'}
{3: 'As you get closer, you finally recognize Bambinata.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bambinata stops her dance and heads to the mini player, turning off the music.'}
{2: "Is that Kowloong music I'm hearing?", 3: 'Sound Effect', 4: 'Are you practicing a Kowloong dance?', 5: 'Sound Effect'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Yes. Bambinata wants to show it to you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Because Bambinata is aware of the Double Seventh Festival.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'And it is a festival celebrated in Kowloong.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'So Bambinata wants to learn the Kowloong dance.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She looks your way and attempts a somewhat clumsy Kowloong bow.'}
{2: "That's quite different from the Bambinata I remember.", 3: '30'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Hmm?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bambinata cocks her head and lets out a questioning hum.'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "If you don't approve, Bambinata can just delete what has been learned...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No, no, no.', 3: '35', 4: "That's not what I mean at all.", 5: '35'}
{2: 'I want to see you perform that dance.', 3: '36'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'So... does that mean you "approve"?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bambinata bows to show her gratitude, then starts the music again.'}
{3: 'Sitting on the floor, Bambinata slowly rises with the melody, her fluid movements elegant and captivating.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After a small leap that carries her toward you, Bambinata stumbles half a step.'}
{3: 'But she immediately regains her balance, turning that misstep into a graceful pivot and instinctively landing on her toes.'}
{3: 'And with that final flourish, the dance ends.'}
{2: "That's wonderful.", 3: '59', 4: "Exactly what I'd expect from you, Bambinata.", 5: '59'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Bambinata... made a mistake.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Bambinata's face stays calm, but her restless hands reveal her uncertainty."}
{2: 'Your dance was clearly beautiful.', 3: '63'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Thank you for reassuring Bambinata, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Still, it looks like Bambinata hasn't absorbed enough dance knowledge.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You need to follow your heart when you dance.', 3: '67', 4: 'I saw your raw emotions in that dance.', 5: '70'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Heart...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Otherwise, there would be no way for your feelings to come through.', 3: '72'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Raw emotions...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Bambinata understood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'In fact, the emotion Bambinata has right now is wanting to dance with you, Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'This is the only way to fully express how Bambinata feels about you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I see.', 3: '77', 4: 'Though I might be a bit rusty...', 5: '77'}
{2: '(Bow to Bambinata, inviting her to join)', 3: '78'}
{3: "You change the mini player's music to a tune you know by heart."}
{3: 'A waltz plays, and you move in sync with its melody.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You offer your hand to Bambinata, who glides gracefully toward you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'This quiet clearing is her entire world now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Right now, the spotlight is on the two of you alone.', 4: '1'}
